text: Joseph William Ashton (9 October 1933 – 30 March 2020), usually known as Joe Ashton, was a British Labour Party politician. He was a Member of Parliament from 1968 to 2001 representing Bassetlaw. He was born in Sheffield, West Riding of Yorkshire. In 2007, Ashton was appointed an OBE. Ashton died on 30 March 2020, aged 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Interview BBC Radio Four, 17 July 2009. * Joe Ashton interview at History of Parliament Online Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:UK MPs 1966–1970 Category:UK MPs 1970–1974 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Politicians from Sheffield
title: Joe Ashton
